LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DamageAmount.label: melee damage
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DamageAmount.description: Damage done per hit in melee combat.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Cooldown.label: melee cooldown
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Cooldown.description: How long it takes to recover after striking with this as a melee weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_SharpDamageMultiplier.label: melee sharp damage
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_SharpDamageMultiplier.descri: Multiplier on melee damage with sharp attacks like cutting or stabbing for items made of this material.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BluntDamageMultiplier.label: melee blunt damage
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BluntDamageMultiplier.descri: Multiplier on melee damage with blunt attacks for items made of this material.
